test_cases.description: EQUALS comparison returns true when equal
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_comparison
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: EQUALS
              subject: 10
              value: 10
            then: "equal"
            else: "not_equal"

test_cases.description: EQUALS comparison returns false when not equal
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_comparison
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: EQUALS
              subject: 10
              value: 20
            then: "equal"
            else: "not_equal"

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_comparison
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: NOT_EQUALS
              subject: 10
              value: 20
            then: "not_equal"
            else: "equal"

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_comparison
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: GREATER_THAN
              subject: 20
              value: 10
            then: "greater"
            else: "not_greater"

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_comparison
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: LESS_THAN
              subject: 10
              value: 20
            then: "less"
            else: "not_less"

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_comparison
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL
              subject: 10
              value: 10
            then: "gte"
            else: "not_gte"

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_comparison
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL
              subject: 10
              value: 10
            then: "lte"
            else: "not_lte"

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_comparison
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      definitions:
        THRESHOLD: 18
      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: GREATER_THAN
              subject: $THRESHOLD
              value: 15
            then: "above"
            else: "below"
